item.title: Pure Gel Corn Protector Rings
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The Fresco Pure Gel Corn Protector Ring is a toe ring made of very soft elastic Deramed® Gel specially designed to protect the dorsal region of the toes. It is specially designed with a thick top and a gap for the corn ensures perfect positioning to protect painful corns. Instantly relieves pain and discomfort. Prevents the appearance of new corns, especially in the case of claw or hammer toes.

The post Pure Gel Corn Protector Rings appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• Offers protection for the dorsal region of the toes and helps to minimize the appearance of new corns
  • Made of soft and elastic Deramed® gel that contains mineral oil to moisturize and hydrate the skin, helping to break down calluses
  • Designed with a thick top and gap to ensure maximum comfort for the wearer by minimizing contact with and eliminating pressure on the corn
  • Durable, washable and reusable
  • Sold in pairs

The post Pure Gel Corn Protector Rings appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Athletic Arm Compression Sleeves
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The No Varix Sports Training Graduated Compression Arm Sleeves deliver performance enhancing compression to the front and back of the arms to increase blood circulation and provide muscle support during athletic training and recovery. The sleeves feature seamless gradient compression which provides wide ribbing in the front for bicep support and tight ribbing in the back and lower arm for triceps and forearm support.

The post Athletic Arm Compression Sleeves appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
The compression sleeve fabric is breathable and moisture wicking, allowing the garment and athlete to stay cool, dry and light during exertion. Developed by a professional athletic trainer, the compression leg sleeves are ideal for runners, cyclists, triathletes, and anyone else who is on their feet and would like to increase the blood flow to their arms.

  • Specially designed for increased muscle support during sports training for enhanced athletic performance.
  • Use for cycling, basketball, softball, baseball, football, soccer, volleyball, running, rugby, and other high intensity sports training.
  • A great choice for sports activities, travel or everyday use. Use on long flights to reduce uncomfortable leg and ankle swelling, cramping and minor variscosities
  • Pulls moisture from your skin, dries quickly and helps regulates skin temperature. Moisture-wicking fabric helps keep you cool, dry and ready for all-day action.

  • Learn more about the benefits of compression.

The post Athletic Arm Compression Sleeves appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Gel Hand Exerciser Ball for Joint Decongestion, RSI, Arthritis & More
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
• Increases flexibility, reduces stress, eases muscle tension, relieves joint pain, prevents stiffness, develops grip, and strengthens the fingers, hands and forearms
  • Made of a mineral gel enriched by Rose Hip Oil to allow moisturizing and hydration of the skin during use
  • Durable, Washable and Reusable

The post Gel Hand Exerciser Ball for Joint Decongestion, RSI, Arthritis & More appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
The Fresco HandGym Pure Gel Hand Exerciser Stress Ball has been created to optimize the entire rehabilitation process and is often used for the development and improvement of propioception, hand and forearm muscle strengthening, mobility and “light touch” improvement, rheumatoid joint decongestion, repetitive stress injury (RSI) treatment, arthritis, and fine tuning dexterity, coordination and motor control in the fingers, hands and arms.

The HandGym will have a long life if cared for properly. If it gets dirty, wash with warm soapy water, rinse and dry carefully with a cloth towel, and dust with Talcum powder.

Exercises

The post Gel Hand Exerciser Ball for Joint Decongestion, RSI, Arthritis & More appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Counterforce Brace with Adjustable Pads
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
AT Surgical’s Counterforce Brace with Adjustable Neoprene Padding will reduce weariness and minimize the danger of further injury. Whether suffering from Tennis Elbow, Golf Elbow, or Carpal Tunnel, our elbow brace has been aiding people with muscle strain for 40 years. Complete with two velcro-backed neoprene pads, our brace is designed to alleviate muscle strain so you can keep performing.

The post Counterforce Brace with Adjustable Pads appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• Innovative design reduces pain
  • Two removable adjustable neoprene pads – place pads at specific pressure points
  • Adjustable velcro® strap for perfect fit, with durable nylon clip for easy on/easy off
Forearm Size Brace Size
12.5″ – 15″ Small
15″ – 17″ Medium
17″ – 20.5″ Large

The post Counterforce Brace with Adjustable Pads appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Tennis Elbow Brace with Hot/Cold Pack
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Prevent Tennis Elbow pain with this pain relieving orthopedic solution, the Tennis Elbow Brace. It applies firm, consistent, yet gentle pressure to the tendons around the elbow joint. It will allow continued activity and allows for a full range of motion. Use the included hot/cold pack to treat pain and strain.

The post Tennis Elbow Brace with Hot/Cold Pack appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• Comes with reusable gel hot/cold pack
  • Can be used with or without hot/cold pack
  • One size fits most

The post Tennis Elbow Brace with Hot/Cold Pack appeared first on AT Surgical.
